pat.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to lightly touch someone or something several times with your hand flat, especially to give comfort
pat.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a friendly act of touching someone with your hand flat
pat.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Mrs Dodd gave the child a pat on the head.
